childcare.description: Trusted nannies and caregivers experienced with international households.

relocation.title: Move-in & Relocation Prep

elderCare.description: Companionship, medication reminders, and wellness-focused care.

petCare.title: Pet & Home Management
petCare.description: Reliable sitters, walkers, and property check-ins while you travel.

lifestyle.title: Personal Lifestyle Support
lifestyle.description: Private chefs, errand specialists, and personal assistants on demand.

process.title: From search to support in four simple steps

step1.title: Share your household profile
step1.description: Complete our guided intake detailing routines, preferences, languages, and required certifications.

step2.title: Meet curated professionals
step2.description: Receive a shortlist with video intros, verified credentials, and transparent pricing to compare with ease.

step3.title: Book and confirm
step3.description: Schedule your service with instant or approved booking. Communicate directly through secure messaging.

step4.title: Rate and rebook
step4.description: Share feedback after each visit. Save your favorites and rebook with one click for ongoing support.

concierge.title: Ready to find your perfect match?
concierge.subtitle: Schedule a consultation to discuss your household needs. We'll introduce you to vetted professionals within 48 hours.

verifiedProfessionals.title: Verified professionals
verifiedProfessionals.description: Every professional undergoes background checks and identity verification

securePayments.title: Secure payments
securePayments.description: Pay safely through Stripe with escrow protection until service completion

realTimeBooking.title: Real-time booking
realTimeBooking.description: See availability and book instantly or request approval for custom needs

reviewSystem.title: Review system
reviewSystem.description: Two-way reviews ensure accountability and help you make informed decisions

footer.description: Connect with vetted housekeepers and caregivers across Colombia. Fully screened, onboarded, and ready to support your lifestyle.

meta.title: Booking Platform - Instant Service Scheduling | Maidconnect
meta.description: Schedule services with instant booking or request approval. Real-time availability and smart filtering make finding the right match effortless. 500+ bookings monthly.

hero.headline: Book trusted professionals in minutes
hero.description: Schedule services with instant booking or request approval. Real-time availability and smart filtering make finding the right match effortless.

features.title: Powerful booking features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to schedule services quickly and confidently

instantBooking.title: Instant & Approved Booking
instantBooking.description: Book immediately with verified professionals or request approval for custom needs. Get instant confirmation for standard services.

realTimeAvailability.title: Real-Time Availability
realTimeAvailability.description: See professional calendars and available time slots before booking. Never waste time requesting unavailable dates.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.description: Set up recurring bookings, sync with your calendar, and receive automated reminders before every service.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Four simple steps to book your perfect professional

step1.title: Filter & Search
step1.description: Filter by service type, date, location, and professional ratings

step2.title: Select Professional
step2.description: View availability, read reviews, and browse portfolio galleries

step3.title: Confirm Booking
step3.description: Choose date and time, add service add-ons, and authorize payment

step4.title: Get Reminders
step4.description: Receive automatic reminders and communicate via secure messaging

benefits.title: Why customers love our booking system

noPhoneTag.title: No more phone tag
noPhoneTag.description: See real-time availability and book instantly without endless back-and-forth calls or emails.

transparentPricing.title: Transparent pricing
transparentPricing.description: Know exactly what you'll pay before booking. See hourly rates, add-on costs, and total price upfront.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Book one-time services or set up weekly, biweekly, or monthly recurring appointments with automatic discounts.

easyRescheduling.title: Easy rescheduling
easyRescheduling.description: Life happens. Reschedule or cancel bookings with just a few clicks, subject to professional's cancellation policy.

cta.title: Ready to book your first service?
cta.description: Join hundreds of satisfied customers who trust MaidConnect for their home service needs

features.title: Trust built into every profile

verifiedCredentials.title: Verified Credentials
verifiedCredentials.description: Background checks, identity verification, and certification validation ensure every professional meets our high standards.

customerReviews.title: Customer Reviews & Ratings
customerReviews.description: Real feedback from verified bookings with detailed ratings on quality, communication, punctuality, and value.

portfolioGalleries.title: Portfolio Galleries
portfolioGalleries.description: Before/after photos and work samples from past projects showcase the quality you can expect.

howItWorks.title: How we verify professionals
howItWorks.description: Our rigorous vetting process ensures quality and safety

step1.title: Application Review
step1.description: We review every application for experience, qualifications, and professionalism

step2.title: Document Verification
step2.description: Background checks, ID verification, and certification validation

step3.title: Portfolio Assessment
step3.description: Review work samples and past projects to ensure quality standards

step4.title: Ongoing Monitoring
step4.description: Continuous review of ratings, feedback, and service quality
